name: TanZen HD - Relaxing tangram puzzles
description:
Find your Zen, with this updated version of the classic tangram puzzle game with over 500 puzzles!

Choose a puzzle to solve, and try to fit all seven game pieces within the shaded puzzle area without overlapping. TanZen HD will recognize when the puzzle is finished. Pick up and play for two minutes, or two hours!

Features in TanZen HD that you won't find in the iPhone version:
- Entirely new high resolution graphics!
- 35 unique piece skins! Solve a page of puzzles to unlock each new design.
- 5 different sand backgrounds.
- Multiple save slots for family play.
- Streamlined interface, with every option available from the main screen.
- Larger play area for solving puzzles.
- New puzzle picker layout, showing more puzzles per page.
- Play songs from your own music library, right inside the game.
- Left and right landscape orientation support.
- 34 Game Center achievements! Finish a page of puzzles to earn an award.

Standard features:
- Retina display graphics!
- Over 500 puzzles!
- Large, intuitive touch controls.
- Solve puzzles in any order.
- Hint system.
- Puzzle memory keeps track of multiple, in progress, puzzles.
- Puzzle reset. Give your device a hard shake to send the pieces back to the corners.
- Track your progress, with a complete view of all your completed puzzles.
- Advanced mode for expert puzzlers.
- Soothing background music and sounds by Atomicon.
